page.title: 09Farming_In our area.
page.content: In our area there are a lot of farms.Most of them are cattle farms.There is a long list of kinds of cattle.Here are some:Friesan,Hereford, Aberdean Angus,Long Horn,Short Horn, Jersey,Guernsey,Old English.Most farmers stick to the same time for milking which is 4:00.The farmers feed the cows while milking to keep them happy.They feed them on lick which is a liquid with lots of sugar in it.They also feed them on calf pellets. There are a lot of farms that have machines.Here is a list of some: Tractor,Dung spreader,Trailor,Silage machine,and others.In our area there are lots of rural farms.Some farms grow crops like Barley,Wheat,Corn,Bran ,Beet,Maize,Potatoes,Rye,and more.
